name: Explosive Decomission
description:
Help PUSH-BOT clean up the warehouse without getting anything important blown up.

Arrow keys/WASD: move
X: Push
Z: Undo
R: Reset level

Color theme: https://lospec.com/palette-list/dead-weight-8

If you're severely red-green color blind, I'm sorry =/

NOTE: This is a paused prototype. There's more depths to be mined in these mechanics, but I'm not sure I'm willing to dig for it. Adding more kinds of terrain would definitely help, but I was trying for something with less complexity and focusing on the explosives - not the floor.
